channel.title: Work on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: I'm Trying to Avoid AI These Days
item.description: I feel as if the AI hype has peeked, and I am very skeptical about the AI wave that’s happening where majority of the ideas are chatGPT wrappers.

item.title: Can a company vendor lock patient data?
item.description: When I first started my new blog, I wanted to post at least one post a week. But just like everything else I have not being able to post at least one blog post per week.
